resources.string: User move must be a letter.

Each player (you vs. your infinitely smarter and more superior cell phone) takes turns giving letters that form a word. The last person to give a letter that forms a complete word at least three letters long loses. If a person gives a letter so that a word cannot be formed from the letters, the other player can challenge and the person who gave the letter loses. Have fun!
The letters %1$s cannot form a word. The computer was going for %2$s.
Auxiliart cannot form a word. The computer was going for auxiliary.
